project_abstract.cdata: The Small-holder Cattle Development Project aims at improving cattle productivity, through an increased efficiency of converted low-value crop residues, into high-value beef, and beef products. It will further promote marketing linkages on cattle profitability, integrating markets, producers, and processors into a demand-oriented marketing system. The project components will: 1) improve cattle breed, suitable for commercial production, while preserving indigenous breeds. It will strengthen the efforts of provincial governments in cattle breed improvement, upgrading beef bull stations, and where necessary, will import bulls for cross-breeding. Artificial insemination will be complemented with new frozen-straw technology, to improve the genetic system. Cattle vitamin-mineral molasses blocks will be produced, through a pilot plant; 2) increase cattle production, as a result of the cattle breed and feed improvements, and, adequate veterinary services, and animal husbandry practices. With forage enhancement technologies available, sub-components will include household cow-calf raising and cattle fattening, and small-scale commercial feedlots; 3) support cattle and beef market development, as well as upgrade slaughtering/processing facilities, for quality assurance participation; 4) assist the government, by strengthening institutional capacity for better international compatibility practices.

P045264.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>小规模肉牛发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是提高低附加值作物残茬转化为高附加值牛肉和牛肉产品的效率，增加肉牛生产能力。本项目将进一步促进市场营销和肉牛盈利能力之间的联系，使市场、生产和加工企业融入需求导向型营销体系。本项目包括以下子项目：子项目一将改良适合商业生产的肉牛品种，同时保留本地品种。本子项目将加大省级政府改良肉牛品种、对公牛配种站进行升级改造的力度，必要时也将进口公牛进行杂交育种。为了完善遗传体系，将引入新型冻精配种技术，对人工授精技术加以补充。此外，肉牛用维生素-矿物质糖浆舔砖将通过一家试点工厂生产。子项目二将在改良肉牛品种和饲料、提供适当兽医服务及引入畜牧业实践方法基础上增加肉牛生产。如具备饲料改良技术，本子项目将设置小母牛饲养和肉牛育肥以及小型商业化育肥场两个二级子项目。子项目三将支持开发肉牛和牛肉市场，对屠宰或加工设施进行升级改造，以便各方参与保证质量。子项目四将协助政府加强机构能力，采用国际通用实践方法。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
